title: Hextech bug for champ shard?
body: I opened janna and i didn't get anything else besides janna? you're suppose to get extra essence if its under 6300 and its a 1350 skin.. with no extra essence..

replies.body:
Hextech content is completely random, and you don't always get essence with rerolls or chests, regardless of the value of the shard it contains. 

Check out our [Hextech Crafting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more details. Let me know if you have any questions.
